title: Two typo-illustration posters
content:
Hello all,

I just wanted to show two typographic illustration posters  
I've been working on recently. Their purpose is to generate  
interest in my typo-illustration work.

It's the first two images here, 'Sexy as Hell' and 'Natural Beauty'.

[www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001122/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk")

Weird, cool, offensive? Just plain dull? Any input appreciated.

Seb

ps. The lettering can be seen here too...

[http://seblester.co.uk/type\_lettering.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001122/http:/seblester.co.uk/type_lettering.php "http://seblester.co.uk/type\_lettering.php")
author: Seb Lester

comments.content:
I like it. I didn't even notice the girls were digital until I saw the closer views.

- Lex
